Text.title: Setup Projects
Text.desc: This page contains information about setting up various projects.

Text.title: Scroll Links
Text.desc: Use these links to scroll to different parts of the page.

Text.title: How to Install Node.js
Text.desc: How to install Node.js before setting up your project.

Text.title: How to Setup a Vue.js Project
Text.desc: How to setup a Vue.js project that uses Vite.

Text.title: How to Setup a React.js Project
Text.desc: How to setup a React.js project that uses Vite and Tailwind.css.

ScrollLinks.name: How to Setup a Vue Project
How to Setup a React Project

SetupNode.instruction: Check if you already have node installed by running the following command in your terminal.
If you don't have Node.js installed on your computer, you can install it by using this link -> https://nodejs.org/en.

Code.FormatCode:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
  <?import javafx.geometry.Insets?>
  <?import javafx.scene.control.*?>
  <?import javafx.scene.layout.*?>

  <VBox alignment="CENTER" spacing="20.0" prefWidth="300" prefHeight="200" 
	xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/8.0.171" 
	xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" 
	fx:controller="application.ExampleController">

    <Label fx:id="numberLabel" text="0" 
           style="-fx-font-size: 9em; -fx-text-fill: blue;"/>

    <Button text="Increment" onAction="#handleIncrement" prefWidth="125"/>
    <Button text="Decrement" onAction="#handleDecrement" prefWidth="125">
       <VBox.margin>
	  <Insets bottom="20"/>
       </VBox.margin>
    </Button>
  </VBox>
Code.CopyCode:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?import javafx.geometry.Insets?>
<?import javafx.scene.control.*?>
<?import javafx.scene.layout.*?>

<VBox alignment="CENTER" spacing="20.0" prefWidth="300" prefHeight="200" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/8.0.171" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="application.ExampleController" fx:id="UniqueId">
	<Label fx:id="numberLabel" text="0" style="-fx-font-size: 9em; -fx-text-fill: blue;"/>
	<Button text="Increment" onAction="#handleIncrement" prefWidth="125"/>
	<Button text="Decrement" onAction="#handleDecrement" prefWidth="125">
		<VBox.margin>
			<Insets bottom="20"/>
		</VBox.margin>
	</Button>
</VBox>

SetupVue.instruction: Install Vite.
Create a new Vue.js project. If you're prompted to install packages type "y". Replace "your-project-name" with the real name of your project.
Change into your project directory.
Change into your project directory.
Run the application to make sure everything's working. The page should say Vite + Vue. Press control + c to stop running locally.
Install vue-router while in your new project directory
Change into the src directory.
Create the "views", "router", and "utils" directories in the src folder.
Delete the "HelloWorld.vue" file in the "components" directory.
Delete the "vue.svg" file in the "assests" directory.
In the "router" directory create an "index.js" file

In the index.js file paste the following code. Note that "Home" and "SecondPage" are just variable names. You could write something like the following import statement -> "import home-page from '../views/Home.vue';" and have it still work. Save the file when you're finished (command + s).
Now open the "main.js" file in the top-most directory of the src folder. Delete the contents of the file and paste in the following code.

Code.FormatCode:
import { createApp } from 'vue'
  import App from './App.vue'
  import router from './router'

  createApp(App).use(router).mount('#app');
Code.CopyCode:
import { createApp } from 'vue'
import App from './App.vue'
import router from './router'

createApp(App).use(router).mount('#app');

SetupVue.instruction: In the components directory create a file named "RouterBtn.vue".
Paste the following code into "RouterBtn.vue" file in your components folder.

Code.FormatCode:
<template>
        <router-link :to="path" :class="button">
  	  {{ buttonText }}
        </router-link>
  </template>


  <script setup>

  const props = defineProps({
        path: {
  	  type: String,
  	  required: true
        },
        buttonText: {
  	  type: String,
  	  required: true
        }
  });

  </script>


  <style scoped>

  .button {
       display: inline-block;
       padding: 10px 20px;
       color: white;
       background-color: #007bff;
       border: none;
       border-radius: 4px;
       text-align: center;
       text-decoration: none;
       font-size: 16px;
  }

  .button:hover {
       background-color: #0056b3;
  }

  </style>
Code.CopyCode:
<template>
	<router-link :to="path" :class="button">
		{{ buttonText }}
	</router-link>
</template>


<script setup>

const props = defineProps({
	path: {
		type: String,
		required: true
	},
	buttonText: {
		type: String,
		required: true
	}
});

</script>


<style scoped>

.button {
	display: inline-block;
	padding: 10px 20px;
	color: white;
	background-color: #007bff;
	border: none;
	border-radius: 4px;
	text-align: center;
	text-decoration: none;
	font-size: 16px;
}

.button:hover {
	background-color: #0056b3;
}

</style>

SetupVue.instruction: In the "views" directory create files named "Home.vue" and "SecondPage.vue".
Paste the following code in the "Home.vue" file in the views folder.
Paste the following code in the "SecondPage.vue" file.
Go to "App.vue" in the src directory, then delete all the code in it. Copy and paste the following Vue Code in the file.

After you're done, save your code and run it using "npm run dev". I think this should be a good start to your project. Obviously you can delete and modify the files. The example files were just to show you how to set the project up.

SetupReact.instruction: Make sure you have node installed by running the following command. If it's installed it should output the version.
Install Vite.
Create a React project using Vite. Note that the template at the is "React".
Change into your project directory.
Install dependencies.
Install Tailwind CSS. Note you can clear your terminal when you're by doing "command + k".

Code.FormatCode:
npm install -D tailwindcss postcss autoprefixer
  npx tailwindcss init -p
Code.CopyCode:
npm install -D tailwindcss postcss autoprefixer
npx tailwindcss init -p

SetupReact.instruction: Install the React router.
Now open your repository in VSCode. You can use the "code ." command if you have it installed.
Open the "tailwind.config.js" file in the topmost directory. Delete its current contents and paste in the following code.

Run the server locally just to make sure the project is running currently. The site should currently say "Vite  + React" if installed correctly. After confirming it's installed correctly, stop running the server and go back to your code. You can stop the server by doing "control + c".
Go to the "src" repository of your project and open the file called "index.css". Delete its current contents and paste the following code. Save the file when you're done (command + s).

THIS IS AN OPTIONAL STEP. If you're getting an error where the "@tailwind" keyword is being underline yellow with a message saying "Unknow word". Go to your VSCode settings json file and paste the following JSON data. Go to this [link](https://flaviocopes.com/fix-unknown-at-rule-tailwind/) for additional details. If there's no error or if you don't mind the error, you can skip this step. It should still work.
Change into the src directory and make the components, styles, utils, views, and router folders. You can run "ls" at the end to confirm it worked.

Code.FormatCode:
cd src
  mkdir -p components styles utils views router
  ls
Code.CopyCode:
cd src
mkdir -p components styles utils views router
ls

SetupReact.instruction: Create the following folders in the "styles" directory.
Create the following files in the components and views directory.
In the styles/components directory in the "RouterBtn.css" file paste the following code.
In the styles/views directory in the "Home.css" file paste the following code
Change back into the main src directory and create the following files in the various folders.

Code.FormatCode:
cd ..
  touch components/RouterBtn.jsx
  touch views/Home.jsx
  touch views/SecondPage.jsx
  touch router/index.jsx
Code.CopyCode:
cd ..
touch components/RouterBtn.jsx
touch views/Home.jsx
touch views/SecondPage.jsx
touch router/index.jsx

SetupReact.instruction: In the src/router directory Open the "index.jsx" file and paste and save the following code in it.
In the src/components directory open the "RouterBtn.jsx" file and paste the following code.
In the src/views directory open the "Home.jsx" file and paste the following code.
In the src/views directory open the "SecondPage.jsx" file and paste the following code. This incorporates tailwind.css and state variables.
Now in "App.jsx" in the top-most directory of src, delete the contents of the file, and paste the following.
In the top-most directory of the src file, open "App.css". Remove the contents of the file and paste the following code.
Now remove unused assets. Press "command + k" to clear your terminal after you're done.

Code.FormatCode:
cd ~
  cd my-react-project
  rm src/assets/react.svg
  rm public/vite.svg
Code.CopyCode:
cd ~
cd my-react-project
rm src/assets/react.svg
rm public/vite.svg

SetupReact.instruction: Run your project to assure everything's working correctly.
